data.scheme_name: Scheme for assistance for Start Ups/ Innovation - Assistance to enroll and participate for Acceleration Program - Startup
data.benefits: Assistance up to Rs. 3 lakh per startup will be provided to enroll and participate for national I International recognized acceleration program.
data.eligibility: All Start-up Units recommended by approved Nodal Institution.
data.conditions:
1. Start ups enrolling/ participating in national/international recognized acceleration program 

2. Conveyance/accommodation expenses will not be considered under this assistance.
data.prerequisites:
For Start-ups 

i) Eligible innovator/ startup shall get registered on the online portal to avail assistance under the scheme. 

ii) The Registered Start-ups shall apply to Nodal Institution with requisites In prescribed format. 

iii) Nodal institutions shall evaluate, validate and recommend the startup project proposal to the office of the Industries Commissioner.

 iv) The startup project proposals will be scrutinized by the Office of the Industries Commissioner and after due diligence, the startup project proposals will be placed before the SLEC for approval/ sanction.
data.context: For promotion of startups and innovation which aims to give a further thrust to the promotion of startups and strengthening the ecosystem in the state, a task force was constituted comprising of leading stakeholders in  the Gujarat startup ecosystem.
data.objective: The key objective of the Gujarat Industrial policy 2020 is to encourage R&D, start innovation and entrepreneurship.
data.description: Assistance upto 3 Lakh per start-up during the operative period of the scheme, (Only applicable if the startup has availed seed support from the govt)
data.how_to_apply: Eligible innovator/ startup shall get registered on the online portal to avail assistance under the scheme.
data.funding_mechanism:
i) Eligible innovator/ startup shall get registered on the online portal to avail assistance under the scheme. 

ii) The Registered Start-ups shall apply to Nodal Institution with requisites In prescribed format. 

iii) Nodal institutions shall evaluate, validate and recommend the startup project proposal to the office of the Industries Commissioner.

 iv) The startup project proposals will be scrutinized by the Office of the Industries Commissioner and after due diligence, the startup project proposals will be placed before the SLEC for approval/ sanction. 

v) The Detailed procedures for approval/sanctions of Nodal Institution/ Startups, conditions and guidelines would be separately issued by the Office of the Industries Commissioner.
data.additional_info: An acceleration program is typically a 3-4 month program for startups at early traction and scaling stage. It is a process of intense, rapid, and immersive education aimed at accelerating the growth of the startup.
data.checklist_info_a:
Mandatory
• Recommendation form 
• Evaluation matrix 
• Pitch Deck 
• Undertaking
• CV of founder & co founder
• Detailed Project Report
• ROC certificate
• Unique ID
Non-Mandatory
• Technical feasibility report
• Financial feasibility report
• Registration/ Incorporation
Certificate
• DIPP Recognition Certificate
data.checklist_info_d:
Address - Block No: 1, 3rd Floor, Udhyog Bhavan, Sector: 11, Gandhinagar - 382010 Gujarat, INDIA.
Contact No. 079-23252588 / 1800-233-0616
Email: icstup@gujarat.gov.in
data.beneficiary: All Industries - Private Limited Company, Public Company, Limited Liability Partnership - Gujarat - All MSMEs, All Non MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
